entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snow beginning overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
